mapper.insert:
insert into group_product_details
group_id, product_id, is_main, sys_code, camera_look, camera_view, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark, pos_index_path, chartlet_product_model_Id, product_index, split_textures_choose_info,
#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cameraLook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cameraView,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posIndexPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chartletProductModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{splitTexturesChooseInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select bp.product_code,gpd.pos_index_path from group_product_details gpd,base_product bp where gpd.product_id = bp.id and group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT gpd.id, gpd.pos_index_path, gpd.chartlet_product_model_Id, gpd.group_id, gpd.product_id, gpd.is_main, gpd.sys_code, gpd.camera_view, gpd.camera_look, gpd.creator, gpd.gmt_create, gpd.modifier, gpd.gmt_modified, gpd.is_deleted, gpd.att1, gpd.att2, gpd.numa1, gpd.numa2, gpd.remark, gpd.product_index, rm.model_path, rm.min_height, bp.product_code, gpd.split_textures_choose_info FROM group_product_details AS gpd LEFT JOIN base_product AS bp ON (gpd.product_id = bp.id) LEFT JOIN res_model AS rm ON ( bp.windows_u3dmodel_id = rm.id ) WHERE gpd.group_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
